DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance Opti-Free® PureMoist® Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution ( MPDS ) compare Biotrue™ Multipurpose Solution ( MPS ) silicone hydrogel contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effectiveness Two Marketed Multi-Purpose Solutions Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses - Study 1
DOC.detailed_description: In 2-period crossover study , eligible participant randomize either Opti-Free® PureMoist® Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution Biotrue™ Multipurpose Solution Period 1 use habitual contact lens , switch alternate solution Period 2 . Each period 30 day length . A 2-day washout period participant refrain use multi-purpose contact lens solution precede Period 1 Period 2 .
DOC.criteria: Wear single vision sphere silicone hydrogel contact lenses ( CooperVision™ Biofinity® , Alcon® Air Optix® Aqua , Bausch+Lomb® PureVision™ ACUVUE® Oasys™ ) daily wear basis ( minimum 8 hour per day , 5 day week ) least one month prior Visit 1 ; Willing wear lens daily wear basis ( minimum 8 hour per day , 5 day week ) duration study , wear lenses 16 hour two day study ; Must habitually use Biguanide preserve multipurpose solution ( Biotrue ) least 30 day prior Visit 1 ; Vision correctable 20/30 Snellen ( foot ) good eye distance prestudy contact lenses Visit 1 ; Have access , capability willingness review answer text message ; Read , sign , date IRB/IEC approve informed consent privacy document enrollment ; Willing follow study procedure visit schedule ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Need wear lens extend wear ( i.e . overnight ) basis study ; Known sensitivity intolerance Biguanide , polyquaternium1 ( POLYQUAD ) , ALDOX preserve lens care product ; Monocular ( one eye functional vision ) fit one lens ; Wearing toric multifocal contact lenses fit monovision ; Use additional lens care product Biguanide preserve multipurpose solution daily enzyme cleaner within one week prior Visit 1 ; Use topical ocular overthecounter ( OTC ) prescribe topical ocular medication , exception rewetting drop , within 7 day prior Visit 1 ; Abnormal ocular condition observe Visit 1 slitlamp examination ; Current history ocular infection severe inflammation within 6 month prior Visit 1 ; Ocular surgery within 12 month prior Visit 1 ; Participation clinical trial within 30 day enrollment ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
